description: Cipher Pol Number 9, a secret World Government intelligence agency with authority to kill in the name of justice. In this episode, Rob Lucci continues to represent CP9 in his battle against Luffy.

keyMoments.title: Lucci Prepares Ultimate Rokushiki Technique
keyMoments.description: Rob Lucci, CP9's strongest agent, declares he will demonstrate the most powerful Rokushiki technique against Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the pinnacle of CP9's martial arts mastery through Lucci's ultimate technique.

description: The World Government's military sea force, responsible for maintaining law and order across the seas. In this episode, they execute a Buster Call on Enies Lobby.

keyMoments.title: Buster Call Fleet Bombardment
keyMoments.description: Five Vice Admirals lead the Buster Call fleet in systematically destroying Enies Lobby with overwhelming firepower.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Marines' absolute military power and their willingness to destroy an entire island.

keyMoments.title: Complete Destruction of Enies Lobby
keyMoments.description: The Marine battleships report the complete obliteration of Enies Lobby's main island.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the devastating effectiveness of a Buster Call operation.
